page.title: 06Shouldham-Village activities
page.content:
All age groups are catered for in the range of clubs and groups run in the village. { {Ladybirds:}This club is for females of all ages and was formed three years ago. The object of this is to enable the women to get together once a month and meet socially. Visits,talks and outings are arranged : the aim was to be a locally centred activity.
{Women's Institute:}This group meets monthly in the Village Hall and has 29 members. Apart from the regular meetings other demonstrations are arranged for the whole village. The latest demonstration was on Microwave Cooking.
